description: Example of a WEIGHTED EXERCISE - uses existing global exercise from database. Standard barbell/dumbbell exercise with weight tracking.

lift_logs.notes: Example weighted lift log - weight in lbs, multiple sets of same weight/reps

description: Example of a BODYWEIGHT EXERCISE - uses existing global exercise. is_bodyweight=true indicates no external weight needed.

lift_logs.notes: Example bodyweight lift log - weight=0 for pure bodyweight, or add weight for weighted bodyweight exercises

description: Example of BANDED RESISTANCE EXERCISE - uses existing global exercise. band_type='resistance' indicates resistance band usage.

lift_logs.notes: Example resistance band lift log - weight=0 since resistance comes from band, not external weight

description: Example of BANDED ASSISTANCE EXERCISE - this will create a NEW user exercise. band_type='assistance' indicates assistance band usage.

lift_logs.notes: Example assistance band lift log - bodyweight exercise made easier with assistance band

description: Example of NEW EXERCISE CREATION - this canonical_name doesn't exist in database, will trigger exercise creation workflow.

lift_logs.notes: Example new exercise lift log - demonstrates how new exercises are imported and created
